name: cardano-serialization-lib
description: (De)serialization functions for the Cardano blockchain along with related utility functions

scripts.build:all: npm run build:all:no-gc && npm run build:all:gc
scripts.build:all:no-gc: npm run build:targets:no-gc && npm run build:variants:no-gc
scripts.build:all:gc: npm run build:targets:gc && npm run build:variants:gc
scripts.build:targets:no-gc: npm run rust:build-nodejs && npm run rust:build-browser && npm run rust:build-web
scripts.build:targets:gc: npm run rust:build-nodejs:gc && npm run rust:build-browser:gc && npm run rust:build-web:gc
scripts.build:variants:no-gc: npm run rust:build-browser-inlined && npm run rust:build-asm
scripts.build:variants:gc: npm run rust:build-browser-inlined:gc && npm run rust:build-asm:gc
scripts.rust:build-nodejs: node scripts/build-helper.js build --target nodejs --variant normal --gc false
scripts.rust:build-browser: node scripts/build-helper.js build --target browser --variant normal --gc false
scripts.rust:build-browser-inlined: node scripts/build-helper.js build --target browser --variant inlined --gc false
scripts.rust:build-web: node scripts/build-helper.js build --target web --variant normal --gc false
scripts.rust:build-asm: node scripts/build-helper.js build --target browser --variant asm --gc false
scripts.rust:build-nodejs:gc: node scripts/build-helper.js build --target nodejs --variant normal --gc true
scripts.rust:build-browser:gc: node scripts/build-helper.js build --target browser --variant normal --gc true
scripts.rust:build-browser-inlined:gc: node scripts/build-helper.js build --target browser --variant inlined --gc true
scripts.rust:build-web:gc: node scripts/build-helper.js build --target web --variant normal --gc true
scripts.rust:build-asm:gc: node scripts/build-helper.js build --target browser --variant asm --gc true
scripts.js:publish-nodejs:prod:no-gc: node scripts/build-helper.js publish --target nodejs --variant normal --gc false --env prod
scripts.js:publish-nodejs:beta:no-gc: node scripts/build-helper.js publish --target nodejs --variant normal --gc false --env beta
scripts.js:publish-browser:prod:no-gc: node scripts/build-helper.js publish --target browser --variant normal --gc false --env prod
scripts.js:publish-browser:beta:no-gc: node scripts/build-helper.js publish --target browser --variant normal --gc false --env beta
scripts.js:publish-browser-inlined:prod:no-gc: node scripts/build-helper.js publish --target browser --variant inlined --gc false --env prod
scripts.js:publish-browser-inlined:beta:no-gc: node scripts/build-helper.js publish --target browser --variant inlined --gc false --env beta
scripts.js:publish-asm:prod:no-gc: node scripts/build-helper.js publish --target browser --variant asm --gc false --env prod
scripts.js:publish-asm:beta:no-gc: node scripts/build-helper.js publish --target browser --variant asm --gc false --env beta
scripts.js:publish-nodejs:prod:gc: node scripts/build-helper.js publish --target nodejs --variant normal --gc true --env prod
scripts.js:publish-nodejs:beta:gc: node scripts/build-helper.js publish --target nodejs --variant normal --gc true --env beta
scripts.js:publish-browser:prod:gc: node scripts/build-helper.js publish --target browser --variant normal --gc true --env prod
scripts.js:publish-browser:beta:gc: node scripts/build-helper.js publish --target browser --variant normal --gc true --env beta
scripts.js:publish-browser-inlined:prod:gc: node scripts/build-helper.js publish --target browser --variant inlined --gc true --env prod
scripts.js:publish-browser-inlined:beta:gc: node scripts/build-helper.js publish --target browser --variant inlined --gc true --env beta
scripts.js:publish-asm:prod:gc: node scripts/build-helper.js publish --target browser --variant asm --gc true --env prod
scripts.js:publish-asm:beta:gc: node scripts/build-helper.js publish --target browser --variant asm --gc true --env beta
scripts.js:prepublish: npm run rust:test && rimraf ./publish && cp -r ./rust/pkg ./publish && cp README.md publish/ && cp LICENSE publish/
scripts.js:ts-json-gen: cd rust/json-gen && cargo +stable run && cd ../.. && node ./scripts/run-json2ts.js && node ./scripts/json-ts-types.js
scripts.postinstall: git submodule update --init --recursive && cd binaryen; cmake . && make

hooks.pre-push: npm run rust:test && npm run rust:build-nodejs

author: EMURGO
